node.title: Table2
node.excerpt: Read and write cloud-stored spreadsheets with a sheet.best API URL

node.title: Retrowave
node.excerpt: A sleek and retro-inspired dark theme.

node.title: Simple Block Rotation
node.excerpt: Adding rotation to blocks is as easy as it should be: Adding a single component!

node.title: Navigator
node.excerpt: Adds a navigator component which can make entities walk on fixed paths, or generally walk to targetted blocks.

node.title: Minecraft Documentation Implemention
node.excerpt: Implements the minecraft documentations inside bridge

node.title: Custom Entity Syntax
node.excerpt: Adds support for custom entity syntax such as adding component groups or spell effects directly in events.
